message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $110. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to pay a bit less.  Would you be willing to go down to $95?  This is a fair price for both of us, and it would allow us to make a deal.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $95.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $105?
